Name: Fragment of a stela
Description: Several fragments of a stela, put together in a gypsum cast. Parts of the two lowermost registers have been preserved. At the bottom these are bordered by a double line. On the left is a single borderline. Some of the figures have inner detail (such as carved eyes, noses and mouths, the ears are indicated as a gap in the coiffure). The accompanying inscriptions are in columns without borders.
